testcase.classname: Test Case 01: User could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user click on link of register..........................................passed When user select gender.....................................................passed And user enter first name...................................................passed And user enter last name....................................................passed And user select birthdate...................................................passed And user enter registration email...........................................passed And user enter company name.................................................passed And user enter registration password........................................passed And user confirm registration password......................................passed And user click register button..............................................passed Then user should have a success message for registration....................passed

testcase.classname: Test Case 02: User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user click login link...................................................passed And user enter login email..................................................passed And user enter login password...............................................passed And user click login button.................................................passed Then user should have a success message for login...........................passed

testcase.classname: Test Case 03: User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user click login link...................................................passed And user click forgot password..............................................passed And user enter email to reset password......................................passed And user click recover button...............................................passed Then user should have a success message for recover.........................passed

testcase.classname: Test Case 04: Logged User could search for any product
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user click login link...................................................passed And user enter login email..................................................passed And user enter login password...............................................passed And user click login button.................................................passed And user enter name of item to search for...................................passed And user click search button................................................passed Then user should have products contains the searched word...................passed

testcase.classname: Test Case 05: Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user click login link...................................................passed And user enter login email..................................................passed And user enter login password...............................................passed And user click login button.................................................passed And user change currency from usd to euro...................................passed Then all products shown are in euro.........................................passed

testcase.classname: Test Case 06: Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user click login link...................................................passed And user enter login email..................................................passed And user enter login password...............................................passed And user click login button.................................................passed And user hover on electronic category.......................................passed And user click on cellPhone category........................................passed Then cell phones page should appear to the user.............................passed

testcase.classname: Test Case 07: Logged user could filter with color
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user click login link...................................................passed And user enter login email..................................................passed And user enter login password...............................................passed And user click login button.................................................passed And user hover on apparel category..........................................passed And user click on shoes category............................................passed And user change color to red................................................passed Then shoes with red color only should appear to the user....................passed

testcase.classname: Test Case 08: Logged user could select different tags
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user click login link...................................................passed And user enter login email..................................................passed And user enter login password...............................................passed And user click login button.................................................passed And user open search page...................................................passed And user choose awesome tag.................................................passed Then awesome products page should appear to the user........................passed

testcase.classname: Test Case 09: Logged user could add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user click login link...................................................passed And user enter login email..................................................passed And user enter login password...............................................passed And user click login button.................................................passed And user navigate to books pages............................................passed And user add items to shopping cart.........................................passed And user navigate to shopping cart..........................................passed Then added items should appear at shopping cart.............................passed

testcase.classname: Test Case 10: Logged user could add different products to Wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user click login link...................................................passed And user enter login email..................................................passed And user enter login password...............................................passed And user click login button.................................................passed And user navigate to books pages............................................passed And user add items to wish list.............................................passed And user navigate to wish list..............................................passed Then added items should appear at wish list.................................passed

testcase.classname: Test Case 11: Logged user could add different products to compare list
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user click login link...................................................passed And user enter login email..................................................passed And user enter login password...............................................passed And user click login button.................................................passed And user navigate to books pages............................................passed And user add items to compare list..........................................passed And user navigate to compare list...........................................passed Then added items should appear at compare list..............................passed
